text: Screaming Skulls

The Liche Priests cast terrible curses upon every one of these skulls, enchanting them so that they scream hideously as they are hurled through the air, rising to a deafening crescendo just before they strike their target.
Exploding Skulls
This horrific ammunition bursts into hellish, ethereal flames when it is launched, and as the skulls arc through the air, they blaze an eerie trail of green-fire behind them.
Unbound Magical Reserves
Inscribed with hieroglyphs of malediction, the casket greatly bolsters the magical reserves of any wielder of the arcane.
Unleash the Realm of Souls
When a Casket of Souls is opened, blinding light spills across the battlefield as countless souls scream into the air seeking freedom from the suffering of their confinement.
Amyntok's Protection
The Wizard casts an arcane net, created to hold the Great Deceiver himself. Any caught in its strands will struggle to act.
Rituals of Desecration
You have read the signs as clearly as I. The growing power of Chaos makes no distinction between the living and the dead. Nagash must rise, or our realms of silence will fall.
Incantation of Souls
'Nehekhara will return to the Golden Age!'
Unwavering legions

Now make ready your weapons, my soldiers, for the time is at hand. Go forth, I command you go forth in haste and march with your king into the darkness of the tomb. Make great the name of Settra and Khemri!' 	true
effect_bundles_localised_title_tmb_balefire_magics_khalida_unique	Barrage of Lybaras	true
effect_bundles_localised_description_tmb_balefire_magics_khalida_unique	Lybaras is vengeance given form. It is the wrath, the wrack and the ruin of all those who would dare challenge the Great Land'
Ancient Blades
Blades of long forgotton Dynasties make for formidable weapons.
Crypt Shields
Ancient barrow armour provides superior defence from any attack.
Ancient Relics
Relics of power enhance and bolster resilience.
Tomb Herald Banners
The Banners of the Tomb Kings represent the endless, tireless legions of Nehekhara.
Decapitating Strike
Decapitating Strikes smash foes into the ground with gigantic stone claws and teeth.
Sacred War Statues
Even the strongest and mightiest weapons cannot destroy that which is almost indestructible.
Runic Titans
Extra runes engraved on these titan constructs weave magical spells of protection.
Rotting Fangs and Claws
Fangs and Claws are, surprisingly, an effective way to slaughter your prey.
Bolstered Husks
These creatures are imbued with Dark Magic to increase vitality and bestow a callous cunning.
Foul Incantations
Miasma and foul energies drive these creatures ever onward.
Ancient Bows
These arrows of death darken the sky before falling amidst the ranks of the enemy.
Ancient Quivers
Blesses by Asaph, these quivers provide an almost infinite supply of arrows.
Blessed Bows of Asaph
More potent than standard bows, these blessed bows provide the wielder with powerful attacks.
Reaper Scythes
Reaper Scythes harvest the souls of the enemy with each fell sweep.
Devistating Charge
'Death comes to all who stand in our way'
Padded Armour
Skeletal Steeds and Chariots clad in the finest Nehekharan armour.
Undeathly Vigour
Swift and lightning-fast cavalry will run down the enemies of Nehekhara!
Hail of Ancient Arrows
Skeleton Archers let loose a rain of deadly arrows that's sure to decimate the enemy.
Withering Arrows
Arrows dipped in poison will cripple flesh and bones.
Flaming Arrows
These arrows of death will burn away flesh and melt armour.
Rituals of Infusion

In times of need, the Liche Priests awaken the Ushabti with powerful incantations, allowing the spirits of ancient heroes to possess them. These Ushabti are imposing monuments to Nehekhara's former power.
Ritual Bades
Ushabti wield huge ritualistic weapons, from large-bladed staves that would take the combined strength of three mortal men to lift. These mighty weapons are as elaborately crafted and decorated.
Hieroglyphic Armour
Ushabti's statuesque bodies can withstand enormous damage, and they are incredibly strong. Thus, Ushabti are possessed by the souls of Nehekhara's mightiest heroes.
Great Bows of Speed
Ushabti Great Bows are powerful indeed. The speed the arrow is loosed pierces the toughest armour and flesh.
Great Bows of Reach
Ushabti Great Bows crafted and enchanted helps them to loose arrows much father than their orignal counterparts.
Sand Veil
A Tomb Scorpion hidden, laying in wait for its prey to unsuspectingly fall into its trap.
Powerful Pincers
Should the Scorpion get the opportunity, it is able to literally crush the enemy with its claws; nothing can survive the sheer strength of this blow,
Tail Stinger
Even a shallow wound could be lethal, due to the poison sacks inside the Tomb Scorpion's body.
Underground Stalkers
Sepulchral Stalkers are natual stalkers, and the sands of Nehekhara make for the perfect ambush.
Ammo Pouches
Magical Ammo provides the Sepulchral Stalker with extra volleys of death.
Ornate Staves
Powerful enchantments and runes engraved on these staves deliver more devistating attacks.
Stalking Serpents

Necroserpents travel beneath the ground at a relentless pace, emerging from the depths with sand cascading off their forms, warriors standing proudly upon their hooded backs with spears lowered, ready to spill the blood of their foes
Monstrous Mounts
Their monstrous mounts shatter bones with every swipe of their tails and sink scimitar-sized fangs deep into soft flesh.
Necroserpent's Frenzy
A Necropolis Knight fights with an unwavering ruthlessness.
